meanings.definition: Consisting of or having one compartment or chamber.
meanings.sent1: The unilocular container held all the marbles.
meanings.sent2: The unilocular box was perfect for storing small toys.
meanings.sent3: I bought a unilocular backpack to carry my snacks separately.
meanings.sent4: Her unilocular mind focused solely on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The unilocular balloon floated gracefully in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having a single cell or cavity.
meanings.sent1: The unilocular organism was studied under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The unilocular structure was unique in its simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The unilocular bubble popped with a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: His unilocular heart beat steadily in his chest.
meanings.sent5: The unilocular seed sprouted into a beautiful flower.
